About me

I'm Quan

Student Web Developer

I’m known for being a detail-oriented, well-organized team player. I never miss deadlines, I’m a good communicator and I can juggle multiple tasks at once. In my performance reviews, my supervisor always notes that he appreciates my professionalism and enthusiasm for the job.

In my free time, I like spending it on learning new things from Youtube, yes I'm a visual learner.

Education

  • (Sep 2017 - May 2018) Moraine Valley Community College, Palos Hills, Illinois US

  • (Sep 2018 - Dec 2020) American River College, Sacramento, California US

  • (Jan 2021 - Dec 2023) California State University - Sacramento, Sacramento, California US
